name: Ministar
description:
Ministar is a bite-sized version of my latest game SolarStar.

Watch a cute little star sit in a serande of sounds.

CREDITS:

Music by Amos Wegner (http://twitter.com/fasterthanlime)

Code & Art by Grant Garrett (http://twitter.com/CNIAngel)

Made for Teacart 1k GameJam

♥★
